channel.title: Help w/ codes on testscape server
channel.description: can someone please help me to write codes on testscape server? Like to get phats or something

item.title: Help w/ codes on testscape server
item.dc:creator: @Oddcid11 Oddcid11
item.description:
@Oddcid11 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("phats") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); }
thats a code for a phat set… if you dont want it to be for admins only then just delete && playerRights >= 2 so it looks like if (command.startsWith("phats")) { addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); }

P.S. hehe almost forgot… put that with your custom commands =p

Read full topic
item.source: Help w/ codes on testscape server
